title: Isshou Sukitte Yutta Jan
alternative_title: Isshou Sukitte Yuttajan ; 一生好きってゆったじゃん ; Isshou Suki tte Yutta jan ; Neo Dutch Wife ; Hagane no Kokoro ; Stand By You ; "Kawaii" ; Ipponbana ; Koi wa Zenkei Shisei ; Namu Amidaisuki ; One Flower
status: Isshou Sukitte Yuttajan ; 一生好きってゆったじゃん ; Isshou Suki tte Yutta jan ; Neo Dutch Wife ; Hagane no Kokoro ; Stand By You ; "Kawaii" ; Ipponbana ; Koi wa Zenkei Shisei ; Namu Amidaisuki ; One Flower
description:
Description :
        A collection of one-shots by Yokoyari Mengo.- Chapter 1. **Hagane no Kokoro**- Chapter 2. **Neo Dutch Wife**- Chapter 3. **Stand By You**- Chapter 4. **"Kawaii"**Meet Yukiho Amamiya, a 14-year-old girl who becomes a gravure idol to help her sister. She's cute, and she knows it - but she can't seem to be cute around the boy she likes. Will she ever hear him call her "cute"?  - Chapter 5. **One Flower  (Ipponbana)**- Chapter 6. **Koi wa Zenkei Shisei**- Chapter 7. **Namu Amidaisuki**

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 6: Koi Wa Zenkei Shisei
